content: Hello! I just opened my IDE (VSC) for the day, and saw that the type annotations styling had changed. Does anyone know how I could change it back? I know traditional Rust users prefer the block style annotations, but I personally liked how they were. Thanks in advance!

Rust-analyzer switched from a home made inlay hint implementation to the native vscode inlay hint support: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/11445 AFAIK there is no way back. By the way #t-compiler/rust-analyzer is the stream for rust-analyzer questions.

bjorn3 said:

Rust-analyzer switched from a home made inlay hint implementation to the native vscode inlay hint support: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/11445 AFAIK there is no way back. By the way #t-compiler/rust-analyzer is the stream for rust-analyzer questions.

thanks!
